name: [FMP] Detective Bobit
description: This game is for my Final Major Project! This game is a prequel to one of my earlier games "bobot vs virus", you play as the ancestor of bobot, turning back the time to the early 1890s in England. You are set on a task to help a lady in distress to find her son that has been missing. Look around the area for clues to his whereabouts!
